title: Janary 2012 Open House
content: We will be having our January 2012 Open House, from 11:00 to 1:00 at our Brandon location and from 2:00 to 3:00 at our Temple Terrace location.

title: New Class Schedule
content: Our new class schedule begins today! The calendar has been updated to include the classes at our Temple Terrace location as well as our Brandon location.

title: International Tai Chi Workshop
content: Dunedin will be hosting an International Tai Chi Workshop, led by Tony Kwong at the Dunedin center. Cost for the workshop is is US$175 (meals US$25), and the registration for is available online. More details available here.

title: Chinese New Year
content: January 29 will be the Chinese New Year banquet hosted by the St. Petersburg branch. Tickets are $25 each.
